Gianluigi Buffon Names Cameroon Goalkeeper Thomas N'Kono Has Inspiration To Become A Goalkeeper

Nigeria

1628675607000

Gianluigi Buffon said he was inspired to become a Goalkeeper, after watching then Cameroon Goalkeeper, Thomas N'Kono play at the 1990 FIFA World Cup. He was 12 then.

Cameroon was his second favourite team at the tournament. He named his son, Louis Thomas after Thomas N'Kono
